quote_first: They watched their friend through the glass cover; the heaving of the chest became less and less, the breathing lower and lower, while a purple hue settled upon his body. At
quote_last: , the last division of the wheel had been reached.
title: A.D. 2000
author: Alvarado M. Fuller

quote_last: when they arrived at the old Red Bull Playhouse in upper St. John Street, and the performance had been under way for more than an hour. The theatre was hot and stuffy, almost humid, and it smelt strongly of sweat and unwashed bodies and powerful perfumes.
title: Forever Amber
author: Kathleen Windsor
